title: Hotel Prince
details: Hotel Prince is offering accommodation in Rāngāmāti. Guests can enjoy city views. All guest rooms at the hotel come with a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box.

title: Hotel Hill Ambassador
details: Hotel Hill Ambassador is a 2-star property located in Rāngāmāti. Each accommodation at the 2-star hotel has city views, and guests can enjoy access to a terrace and to a restaurant.

title: Hotel Green Castle
details: Hotel Green Castle is located in Rāngāmāti. The hotel also provides free WiFi and free private parking. The reception at the hotel can provide tips on the area.
